Pre-sales queries :
1.What is Managed Wordpress Hosting ?
Ans: It is a seamless solution provided by ScopeHosts for all those who crave for more power, easy scalability and security, without hiccups of constant manual updates and technical adjustments. Just at a point of single click, Wordpress is installed in your cPanel. You just need to log in, build, edit and manage your website.

We have customized and built our servers specially for wordpress, performing at a optimum level, 20X Faster and secured then a normal Standard Web Hosting Plans. And we have 24/7 Pro Team available to assist with any questions you may have. So stop waiting and start building your blog or website with fast, secured and reliable and cheap Wordpress Hosting.

2.In which location Managed Wordpress Hosting is provided ?
Ans: We provide Managed Hosting service in World-Class TIER III+ Evoswitch Datacenter, the Next-Gen Datacenter with high security, connectivity and sustainaibility, located at Amsterdam, Netherlands.

3.Does Managed Wordpress Hosting come with SSD`s Space ?
Ans: Yes, We have Enterprise SSD`s mounted on Hardware RAID-10 Controller give optimum best results for your website pages to load 20x Faster than normal HDD`s. Unlike HDD`s the SSD`s are not affected by effects of magnetism, which can erase the data. Hence our service comes with Solid State Drives to provide you the best experience in hosting your website.

4. What are the advantages of this hosting service ?
Ans: WordPress makes its users to manage all of the content on website furnished with best suite of themes, add-ons and plugins which can easily installed whenever required. Our hosting service allows you to easily install various themes or plugins and more to have a customized website.
